1136890.name: ChilloutVR - Unlocked Account
1136890.description:
The Unlocked Account DLC for ChilloutVR unlocks the full potential of the game for your account.
Your limits for uploading content and founding groups will be lifted.

You can read more about how to activate the unlocked account for your ABI Community Hub account here:

To use this unlock you will need to link your Steam account with your ABI Community Hub account. While linking, we will check the ownership of the DLC to then unlock your account. You can then see the DLC ownership in your ABI Community Hub Inventory.

This account unlock is permanent and no recurring payments will be necessary.

This unlock will not lift a content ban. If you are banned from uploading content or if your community account is restricted this will not unban your account.
